import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import BaseModal from "../BaseModal"; const defaultStaff = { full_name: "", day_of_birth: "", gender: "Nam", address: "", id_number: "", join_date: "", phone_number: "", bank_account_number: "", bank_name: "", image_front: "", image_back: "", is_active: true, }; function StaffDetailModal({ isOpen, onClose, onSave, staff }) { const [staffData, setStaffData] = useState(defaultStaff); useEffect(() => { if (isOpen) setStaffData(staff || defaultStaff); }, [isOpen, staff]); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target; setStaffData((prev) => ({ ...prev, [name]: type === "checkbox" ? checked : value, })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); onSave(staffData); }; const isEdit = !!staff; return ( } >
Full Name:
Date of Birth:
Gender:
Address:
ID Number:
ID Date:
Phone Number:
Bank Account:
Bank Name:
ID Front Image:
ID Back Image:
Active:
Staff is Active
); } export default StaffDetailModal;
